import React from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from './context/LanguageContext'; import LanguageSelector from './components/LanguageSelector'; import './App.css'; function App() { const { t } = useLanguage(); const renderHTML = (text) => { return { __html: text }; }; const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); return (
{/* Header */}
{/* Logo a la izquierda */} {t('nav.logo')} {/* Links de navegación al centro */}
{t('nav.certifications')} {t('nav.experience')} {t('nav.about')} {t('nav.education')} {t('nav.contact')}
{/* Social, proyectos y selector de idioma a la derecha */}
{/* Proyectos ahora está aquí junto a los botones sociales */} {t('nav.projects')}
{t('hero.linkedin')} {t('hero.github')}
{/* Hero Section */}

{t('hero.tagline')}

{t('hero.linkedin')} {t('hero.github')} {t('hero.email')}

{/* Experience */}

{t('sections.experience')}

{t('experienceItems.job1.title')}

{t('experienceItems.job1.date')}

{t('experienceItems.job1.description')}

{t('experienceItems.job2.title')}

{t('experienceItems.job2.date')}

{t('experienceItems.job2.description')}

{/* Projects */}

{t('sections.projects')}

{t('projectsItems.project1.title')}

{t('projectsItems.project1.description')}

Python FastAPI PostgreSQL

{t('projectsItems.project2.title')}

{t('projectsItems.project2.description')}

Python Pandas Elasticsearch
{/* Technologies */}

{t('sections.technologies')}

{t('technologies.frontend')}

    {Array.isArray(t('technologies.frontendItems')) && t('technologies.frontendItems').map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

{t('technologies.backend')}

    {Array.isArray(t('technologies.backendItems')) && t('technologies.backendItems').map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
{/* Footer */}

{t('footer.inspired')}

{t('footer.copyright').replace('[AÑO]', currentYear).replace('[TU NOMBRE]', 'Tu Nombre')}

{/* Fondo con efecto */}
); } export default App;
